/>
VI.ii.5.1.e
.
Concurrent Payment of FEC and DEA
A Veteran’s spouse, son, or daughter has independent entitlement to Dependents’ Educational Assistance (DEA) under
38 U.S.C. Chapter 35
.  Pay DEA regardless of the fact that the Veteran is receiving FEC.
title: M21-1, Part VI, Subpart ii, Chapter 5 - Federal Employees’ Compensation (FEC)
citation: Part VI, Subpart ii, Chapter 5, Section None
